medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 1 week ago with worsening diffuse epigastric pain. Patient experienced diarrhea, gas, and flatulence for the past two weeks. Following a recent flight, the patient noted weakness, unsteady gait, decreased appetite, and worsening abdominal pain with eating. The patient has had darker urine but no light-colored stools, subjective fevers that resolved with Tylenol, two episodes of emesis yesterday, and reported a weight loss of 5 lbs.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of kidney cancer status post nephrectomy, transitional cell carcinoma of the bladder treated with BCG, new diagnosis of pancreatic cancer, hypertension, and possible splenic vein thrombus on Lovenox.
medical_history.family_history: Father died of throat cancer. Mother died of a stroke.
